issue.title: mySocket.myreceive()
issue.body:
the mySocket.myreceive() function does not seem to work properly when used in the main.py file. It is currently around lines 42-52 in main.py right above the main game while loop. it looks like this, but commented out.

player1.to_string()
mySocket = MySocket.MySocket()

mySocket.connect("54.149.175.19", 1337)
print player1.serialize_class()
mySocket.mysend(player1.serialize_class())

temp_buffer = mySocket.myreceive()
print temp_buffer
